scenario.name: UAC with media, specified PCAP, change SSRC mid call
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:conf-[call_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK5C4F5FE19A8F4D2986AA9A54B8FA6CB6 Call-ID: call-x-[call_number]@[local_ip] CSeq: 101 INVITE To: <sip:conf-[call_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, OPTIONS, INFO, BYE, CANCEL, ACK, UPDATE, NOTIFY User-Agent: Mitel NeTS 5.12.4034.0/5.12.4035.0 Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] From: "NeTS mctx1_[call_id]" <sip:mctx1_[call_id];transport=[transport]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag09[call_number]
v=0 o=- 126156061 1 IN IP4 [media_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 0 18 101 111 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=rtpmap:111 X-nt-inforeq/8000 a=ptime:20 a=sendrecv
